abstract: The book, by Eric E. Schmidt, executive chairman of Google, and Jared Cohen, director of Google Ideas, grows out of an essay the two wrote for Foreign Affairs magazine.
snippet: The book, by Eric E. Schmidt, executive chairman of Google, and Jared Cohen, director of Google Ideas, grows out of an essay the two wrote for Foreign Affairs magazine.
lead_paragraph: “The Internet is the largest experiment involving anarchy in history,” begins a new book written by two top Google executives, which aims to explain how this experiment will play out in politics, business and even personal lives.

headline.main: Book by 2 From Google Takes a Deep Look at the Web
headline.print_headline: A Book by Two From Google Takes a Deep Look at the Web

abstract: A committee of Parliament on Monday said government should clamp down on companies that exploit tax laws to move profits offshore.
snippet: A committee of Parliament on Monday said government should clamp down on companies that exploit tax laws to move profits offshore.
lead_paragraph: The British government announced plans on Monday to crack down on tax dodgers as a parliamentary report criticized United States companies for what it described as tax avoidance.

headline.main: British Lawmakers Accuse Multinationals of ‘Immorally’ Avoiding Taxes
headline.print_headline: Britain Says It Will Go After Tax Dodgers
